Hi every one

I am trying to make a soft who provide vocal control under a house
automation.

I will connect SOM to NEAT, but i am open for all new idea :) 

If you have interesting link or something eles just let me know.


Is someone know where i can found phoneme database for french?


I ll make the audio stream passing thrue SOM , the ouput vector ll go
to neat entrance, and neat output ll be connect to house's automation
by computer.

I don t need to have a big amount of word . I don t need to have
continious speaking recognizer.

If you want to know something else just ask :)

Best regards ,

Fabian
